plot: The shooting of &"Je vous presente Pamela&" (may I introduce Pamela) begins. This is the story of en english married wife falling in love and running away with the father of her French husband. Will be simultaneously shozn the shooting, the behavior of the people (including the technical team) on the set, and a part of their private life (a factor of complication)...   Written by  Yepok
title: La noche americana
